body.name: White Classic Blackout Curtains for Bedroom, Pack of 2 Window Hanging Panels 63 inch Long Blind Off Grommet Curtains, Thick Black Out Window Screen, No Light Drapes (42 x 63 inch, Beige)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Lemon Explosion and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 19 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: WHAT'S IN THE PACKAGE? A Set of 2 Beige blackout curtain panels, each panel measures 42 Inches the width and 63 Inches the length. Each curtain panel includes 6 silver metal grommet rings, each grommet inner diameter is 1.6 inch, which is compatible with most rods, and easy slides to install.

TOP QUALITY FUNCTIONS: Blackout curtains for bedroom privacy will bring you a much better sleep. Our bedroom curtains block out 95% - 99% sunlight and UV rays. Quiet and dark environment will make you have a fantastic sleep anytime during the day, waking up full of energy and happiness.

THICK THERMAL INSULATED CURTAINS: Our triple weave technology thermal curtains will naturally balance your room temperature by insulating against heat during summer and cold during winter at the same time acting as a barrier preventing energy from escaping the room, and help saving on your energy bills.

FINEST BLACKOUT FABRICS: Our 230GSM window curtains are made of durable yet smooth and elegant fabric with a silky touch and a beautiful drape that bring charm and modernity to your interior, same color on the front and back. These insulated curtains are manufactured in a STANDARD 100 certified by the OEKO‑TEX factory.

WASHING IS SIMPLE: Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if needed. Please do not bleach. If you are not satisfied with your purchase at any point and for any reason, you can contact us for a replacement, (in fact, you don't even have to send the product back).
body.description: "Introducing the White Classic [2-Panels] Blackout Curtains. These premium-quality blackout curtains are designed to block out unwanted light and noise, providing you with the perfect ambiance to unwind and relax.Enhanced blackout technology: our blackout curtains feature advanced blackout technology, ensuring that no sunlight or external lights can penetrate through, making them ideal for daytime sleepers, shift workers, and light-sensitive individuals.Thermal Insulation: The curtains are crafted with a thermal-insulating lining, creating a barrier against the outside temperature. They keep your room cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter, reducing energy consumption and saving you money on utility bills.Grommet Design: The curtains come with grommets that make installation a breeze. The 1.6 inch grommets allow for easy sliding on any curtain rod, providing a sleek and contemporary look to your living space.Room Darkening Effect: Enjoy a cinema-like atmosphere in the comfort of your bedroom. The room darkening effect ensures you can watch your favorite movies or shows without any glares or distractions.Noise Reduction: Blackout curtains also serve as a barrier against unwanted outdoor noises, creating a calm and serene environment for a restful sleep or relaxation.Premium Quality Material: Made with durable and long-lasting fabric, these blackout curtains maintain their elegance and performance over time, ensuring you get the best value for your money.Versatile Size: The 42x63 inch dimensions are perfect for most bedroom windows, providing ample coverage and allowing for an easy fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Elegant, not Midnight Dark
reviews.reviewText: These curtains block the light very well, but wont make your room pitch black at noon. For me, it's perfect for dimming the noon light enough for the toddler to nap, but so I'm not tripping over toys on my way out of the room. At night, they block all the light pollution from all the flood lights and street lights right outside my kids' windows (if you don't have a night light or hall light on with the door open, you WILL trip over the toys at night). They also are thick enough to do a decent job of keeping the room cool during the day if kept closed.The color is nice (gray), and the material looks elegant with a nice drape, not cheap. There's 2 in a pack which fits the bedroom window great without too much excess or stretching. The metal rings are sturdy and I haven't noticed any corrosion or rusting in our very humid climate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lets no light in
reviews.reviewText: Great! I love these! The only thing I wasn't thrilled about is that mine look blue not dark gray. I kept them because they are good quality and definitely keep out all light. I would make sure to install the rod high enough so the holes in the curtains that go through the rod are above the window because light does come through the holes if not placed high enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick!
reviews.reviewText: I used these as a room separator for our den. It gave our guests plenty of privacy. The material is quite soft but blocks a lot of light. I was surprised they were such good quality for the price. A quick steam and all the wrinkles from packaging were gone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The white is a greyish white.
reviews.reviewText: Seem durable, I was able to iron them without any issues. They maintain our room extra dark, love them. The only thing that caused me to knock off a star is the fact they are not bright white, they are a greyish white curtain. We have a charcoal gray room and they look, just ok. Would of preferred a bright white color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good material and craftsmanship. I bought a different brand first but had to return it due to defects in the fabric and poor quality grommets. This one was not much more expensive and is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good curtains
reviews.reviewText: I like them. They aren't thick, nor do they completely block the light. But it works well enough to darken the room in order for me to take a nap when I need to. The rings on top are a good size to fit any size pole. And they keep the chill out enough. For the small price I paid, I'm 100% satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not pitch black but almost...
reviews.reviewText: These curtains have been a decent addition to my bedroom. The 84-inch length provides good coverage. The thickness effectively blocks most external light. The grommet design makes them easy to install and adjust. Despite being completely synthetic, they have a fabric-like touch. They're a practical choice if you're looking for basic blackout curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job.!
reviews.reviewText: These are a true black out curtains. The sun can be pouring in our bedroom window & if I close these curtains bedroom goes totally dark!! I have bought other black out curtains from a local department store & they are a joke compared to these curtains! Also great value for the money thank you.
